documentation.text:
@dev This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract
 @param contributionId this is the id of the contribution to which the winner is to be declared

BallotResult(uint256,uint256,bool,bool).details: this event is genrated when result of a ballot is declared

params.ballotId: this is the ballot Id for which result is declared
params.contributionId: This is the id of the contribution that is linked to this ballot
params.minTurnOut: this status indicates if minimum amount of user showed up for voting he received more than 66% of votes or false if user lost
params.result: this is the status of the result, either true if user won that is

ContributionBallotCreated(address,uint25.details: This event is emitted during contribution ballot creation

params.ballotId: This is the ballot id of the reward
params.communityReward: This is the community reward amount
params.communityTokenId: This is the id of community token
params.createdAt: time when the ballot was created
params.governanceReward: This is the amount of governance token requested as reward
params.governanceTokenId: This is the id of governance token
params.recordId: This is the record id to which the reward belongs to
params.requester: This is the person who has contributed and is seeking for reward

ContributionVoting(address,uint256,uint2.details: This is when a vote is given by user.

params.ballotId: Id of the ballot where voting is stored
params.contributionId: This is the id of the contribution that is linked to this ballot
params.vote: State of vote : true for yes and false for No

CounterOfferForContribution(uint256,addr.details: this is event which is created when a user proposes counter offer

params.contributionId: This is the id of the contribution that is linked to this ballot
params.newCommunityReward: This is the new reward amount counter offered by the voter
params.newGovernanceReward: This is the new reward amount counter offered by the voter
params.voterId: This is the id of the voter who's vote it is

counterOfferAction(uint256,address,uint2.details: this is event which is created when the owner of the ballot takes action on a specific counter offer

params.contributionId: This is the id of the contribution that is linked to this ballot
params.newCommunityReward: This is the new reward amount counter offered by the voter
params.newGovernanceReward: This is the new reward amount counter offered by the voter
params.status: This is the status of the counter offer that is => either ACCEPTED = 2 | REJECTED = 3
params.voterId: This is the id of the voter who's vote it is

_handleUserTokenTransfers(address,uint25.details: This function will be called when either user is transferring the tokens to other account, or is receiving tokens from other tokens.

params.newBalance: this is the new balance of the user that is after the transfer
params.previousBalance: this is the old balance of the user
params.user: address of the user whose balance is being changed

actionOnCounterOffer(uint256,address[],b.details: This function is called by owner of the contribution to either accept or reject a counter offer

params.action: this is the state of the vote, if true than it means that user accepts the counter offer
params.contributionId: this is the id of the contribution to which the counter offer belongs to
params.counterOfferIds: The id of counter offers in array to accept or reject multiple counter offers at once

castVoteForContribution(uint256,bool).details: This function is called by any user to cast vote

params.contributionId: this is the id of the contribution for which user is voting
params.vote: this is the state of the vote, if true than it means the vote is in favour of the ballot

createContributionVotingBallot(uint256,u.details: This function will create a new contribution voting ballot

declareWinner(uint256).details: This function can be called from external source and also from within the contract

params.contributionId: this is the id of the contribution to which the winner is to be declared

initialize(address,address).details: This function sets the treasury Contract address

params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the new address of treasury contract

initialize(address,address,address).details: This is to set the address of the contracts

params.newContributionContractAddress: This is the address of new voting hub contract
params.newGovernanceContractAddress: This is the address for the governance contract
params.newTreasuryContractAddress: This is the address of new treasury contract

proposeCounterOffer(uint256,uint256,uint.details: This function is called by any user to cast vote

params.contributionId: this is the id of the contribution for which user is creating a counter offer
params.newCommunityReward: new community token amount as reward for the negotiation
params.newGovernanceReward: new governance token amount as reward for the negotiation

setContributionContractAddress(address).details: Sets the contribution contract address so that the voting ballot for contribution can be restricted only to a certain contract that is the contribution contract

setDepositAmount(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_DEPOSIT percentage

params.depositAmount: This is the new deposit amount needed for creating ballot

setMinTurnOut(uint256).details: This function sets the MIN_TURN_OUT percentage

params.minTurnOut: This is the new turnout percentage value

setOwnerAddress(address).details: This function sets the owner address

params.ownerAddress: This is the address of the owner

setVotingPeriod(uint256).details: This function sets the VOTING_BLOCK_PERIOD percentage

ContributionBallotCreated(address,uint25.notice: This event is emitted when a contribution ballot is created by a user and it hold the following details
